org.lenskit.cli

Interface Command

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Crossfold, Eval, GlobalRecommend, Graph, PackRatings, Predict, Recommend, TrainModel, Version

    public interface Command

    Interface implemented by all CLI subcommands. Commands are detected by looking for implementations of this interface using the Java ServiceLoader framework. New implementations can be registered conveniently using the AutoService annotation.

    Since:
    2.1

        String getName()

        Get the name of the command.

        Returns:
        The command’s name.

        String getHelp()

        Get the command’s help.

        Returns:

      • configureArguments

        void configureArguments(net.sourceforge.argparse4j.inf.ArgumentParser parser)

        Configure the argument parser for this command.

        Parameters:
        parser - The argument parser into which the arguments should be configured. This will already be a subparser, the command is not responsible for creating that.

      • execute

        void execute(net.sourceforge.argparse4j.inf.Namespace options)
             throws Exception

        Execute the command.

        Parameters:
        options - The command-line options.
        Throws:
        Exception - if an error occurs in the command.
